Monster Rancher, in Rampage format
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Suggestions for Tecmo: Monster Rancher, in Rampage format
By Sturnum94 on Monday, September 4, 2006 - 04:39 pm:

What if TECMO could make a game like Rampage. I don't think TECMO would get sued, since EVO had Final Fantasy written all over it. What if it would give it the Rampage look, while still maintaining the MR tradition. You could still get Techniques, you would advance your stats, they would even keep the sealing TECMO had in EVO. Your stats would affect how long it took you too destroy things.

POW. would obvioulsy mean the difference between a strong smashing, and a weak one.

LIF: would affect how many hits you would take to finally give up.

SPD: would affect how fast you would move, and how fast you would do a tech.

SKI/Accuracy: would remain the same. You would need skill to accuratly hit weak points in order to destroy anything faster.

You get the point. So, I want to know if this is worth getting looked over. If anyone posts taht this is useless, and should be deleted, I want to say sorry for posting something worhtless.
